error.message: Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Most of the time static::entityTypeManager() is supposed to be used instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Most of the time static::entityTypeManager() is supposed to be used instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to synergy.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.

The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement compatible with Drupal 9.
